summary: Kahlan Amnell is a veteran follower, capable of dealing and taking massive punishment. She wields an enormous Axe of the Punisher. She has modified enchanted  Daedric armor. Skilled with light armor, two handed weapons, and sneak.
descriptionHtml:
Kahlan Amnell is a veteran follower, capable of dealing and taking massive punishment. She wields an enormous Axe of the Punisher. She has modified enchanted Daedric armor. Skilled with light armor, two handed weapons, and sneak.

This mod adds Kahlan Amnell to your game. Kahlan wields an giant axe in one hand and a custom spell in the other. She can be found by the large tree in white run that has a side quest to get sap for. Kahlan is created from the Temptress Race, so you will also need that mod in order for her to work. For whatever reason, she first appears to be naked, but as soon as you ask her to follow you she puts her armor on.

This is my first mod so feel free to critique it as much as possible so i can make a better one.

Please view the credits and check out Apachii and Phsycos1s
